snippet: To the people who turned out to memorialize Eric Garner on Sunday, it seemed that agonizingly little had changed....
abstract: Scores of people gather in Staten Island, NY, on two-year anniversary of death of Eric Garner, black man who died during confrontation with police, to march and memorialize him.

byline.original: By NATE SCHWEBER and SARAH MASLIN NIR

lead_paragraph: To the people who turned out to memorialize Eric Garner on Sunday, it seemed that agonizingly little had changed.

headline.main: Anger Over Police Killings Pervades Memorials on 2nd Anniversary of Garner’s Death
headline.print_headline: Anger Over Police Killings Pervades Memorials on 2nd Anniversary of Garner’s Death
